name: The Storm (itch) (Pixel_Trash)
description:
The Storm is a point and click adventure game.
Created for the Scream Sonic horror game jam, the game has a focus on exploration with a thick atmosphere.

Movement with WASD
Interact with Mouse
Inventory with E

Uploaded close to the deadline, I plan on updating a few things once I get a chance. 
Enjoy in it's current state - hopefully it's not too broken!

*July 6th update: added ability to resize the window
ALT + ENTER to fullscreen

Art + Code
Pixel_trash_

Title Music
Travis Valois

Additional Sounds
